description:
## Objective 
New empty activity should open up on clicking "Help" .

## Steps
1. Install mifos-mobile-cn android app in your phone .
2. On selecting Navigation Drawer , you will find a field "Help" .For now it is not clickable.
3.  **You have to make it clickable** .

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos-mobile-cn).
name: Mifos Mobile CN app: New empty activity should open up on clicking 'Help' button
